name: Tattered Cloth Cap
description: A worn cloth cap that offers minimal protection.
plaggCommentary: At least it'll keep your hair out of your cheese!

name: Leather Headguard
description: A sturdy leather helmet providing decent head protection.
plaggCommentary: Better than nothing! Though it smells like old cheese... in a bad way.

name: Iron Battle Helm
description: A solid iron helmet favored by warriors.
plaggCommentary: Heavy and clunky! But it'll protect your brain from cheese overload!

name: Arcane Circlet
description: An elegant circlet that enhances magical abilities.
plaggCommentary: Fancy! Does it come with a cheese-detection spell?

name: Dragonscale Greathelm
description: A helmet crafted from genuine dragon scales.
plaggCommentary: Ooh, fancy! I bet it's fireproof. Perfect for melting cheese!

name: Novice Robes
description: Simple cloth robes worn by magic apprentices.
plaggCommentary: Comfy! And there's probably room to hide snacks in the pockets!

name: Studded Leather Vest
description: Flexible leather armor reinforced with metal studs.
plaggCommentary: Looks punk rock! Very rebellious, like eating cheese for breakfast!

name: Steel Chainmail
description: Interlocking steel rings providing excellent protection.
plaggCommentary: Jingly! You'll sound like a walking wind chime. Great for sneaking up on cheese!

name: Knight's Platemail
description: Full plate armor offering supreme protection.
plaggCommentary: So heavy! You'll need a crane to get up if you fall. But hey, mobile cheese storage!

name: Cloak of Shadows
description: A mysterious cloak that bends light around the wearer.
plaggCommentary: Sneaky! Perfect for midnight cheese raids!

name: Simple Cloth Leggings
description: Basic cloth pants offering minimal protection.
plaggCommentary: At least they cover your legs! Dignity intact while eating cheese!

name: Leather Trousers
description: Durable leather pants providing decent leg protection.
plaggCommentary: Practical! And they won't tear if you dive into a pile of cheese wheels!

name: Steel Leg Guards
description: Heavy steel armor protecting the legs.
plaggCommentary: Clank, clank, clank! You'll never sneak up on anyone. Or any cheese.

name: Worn Cloth Slippers
description: Soft cloth shoes that have seen better days.
plaggCommentary: Comfy for tiptoeing to the cheese fridge at night!

name: Leather Adventurer Boots
description: Sturdy boots perfect for long journeys.
plaggCommentary: Great for kicking down doors when someone's hoarding the good cheese!

name: Boots of Swift Wind
description: Magical boots that grant incredible speed.
plaggCommentary: So fast! Perfect for cheese delivery services!

name: Rebirth Chestguard
description: Armor that resurrects the wearer upon death.
plaggCommentary: Death-proof! Though I'd rather have cheese-proof armor instead.

name: Crown of the Abyss
description: A crown that grants dominion over the void itself.
plaggCommentary: Spooky and powerful! But can it store cheese in pocket dimensions?

name: Celestial Vestments
description: Sacred robes worn by celestial beings.
plaggCommentary: So holy it hurts my eyes! Do angels eat cheese? Asking for a friend...

name: Armor of Infinite Worlds
description: Armor that exists across all possible realities simultaneously.
plaggCommentary: Mind-bending! I bet in some reality, this armor is made entirely of cheese!
